Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: temperature
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The sampling temperature to control randomness (values between 0.0 to 1.0).

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: maxTokens
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The maximum number of tokens in the generated summary.

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: model
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The specific LLM model to use for summarization (e.g., “gpt-3.5-turbo”).

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: stream
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Whether or not to stream the response (default is false).

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: init(temperature:maxTokens:model:stream:)
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Initializes a new SummarizerOptions with default values for all fields.

Structs/FetchContextsTask.html#/s:9Auror.name: init(name:filenames:inputs:)
Structs/FetchContextsTask.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Initializes a FetchContextsTask with an optional name and list of filenames.

Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: text
Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Extracts and concatenates content from streaming or non-streaming responses.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: model
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The model used for generating the response, made optional as per the protocol.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: created_at
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The timestamp when the response was created.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: response
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The generated text returned by the Ollama API.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: done
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: A boolean indicating if the model has finished generating the response.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: eval_count
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The number of tokens in the generated response.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: tokenUsage
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Token usage is not provided in the Ollama API, so it’s nil.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.name: text
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Returns the generated text content from the Ollama response.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: promptTokens
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The number of tokens used in the prompt.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: completionTokens
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The number of tokens used in the completion.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: totalTokens
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The total number of tokens used in the request.

Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: init(promptTokens:completionTokens:totalTokens:)
Structs/LLMTokenUsage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Initializes the LLMTokenUsage with the given token counts.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.name: inputTokens
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.abstract: The number of input tokens processed up to this point, if available.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.name: outputTokens
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.abstract: The number of output tokens generated up to this point, if available.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: text
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The text content, if the content block represents a text response.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: id
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The unique identifier of the content block, if applicable.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: name
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The name of the tool, if the content block represents a tool invocation.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: input
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: The input parameters for the tool, if applicable.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.name: text
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.abstract: The updated text from the model, if the delta is of type text_delta.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.name: partialJSON
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.abstract: The updated JSON fragment, if the delta is of type input_json_delta.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: delta
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents a delta (change) in the response content, such as text updates.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: contentBlock
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents a complete content block in the response, such as text or tool use.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: usage
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents the usage statistics (e.g., input and output tokens) associated with this event, if available.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.name: Delta
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/De.abstract: Represents a change (delta) in the response content, such as an update to a partial text.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.name: ContentBlock
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Co.abstract: Represents a complete content block in the response.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.name: Usage
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse/Us.abstract: Represents the usage statistics associated with the response.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: id
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The ID of the message returned by the Anthropic API.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: role
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The role of the response, usually indicating it’s from the assistant.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: model
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The model used for generating the response, made optional as per the protocol.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: content
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The content returned by the Anthropic API.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: stopReason
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The reason why the response was stopped (optional).

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: Content
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Nested structure to represent the content data.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: Usage
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Nested structure to represent token usage data (if available).

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: text
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Returns the concatenated text content from the Anthropic content field.

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.name: tokenUsage
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Returns token usage statistics as an LLMTokenUsage object.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.name: isSummarized
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.abstract: A flag indicating whether the ContextItem is a summary.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.name: tokenCount
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.abstract: The estimated token count for the text content of the ContextItem.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.name: init(text:creationDate:isSummary:)
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.abstract: Initializes a new ContextItem with the specified text content and optional parameters for creation date and summary status.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.name: estimateTokenCount(for:)
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.abstract: Helper method to estimate the token count for a given text.

Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.name: isOlderThan(days:)
Structs/ContextItem.html#/s:9AuroraLLM11.abstract: Checks if the ContextItem is older than a specified number of days.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: items
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: A collection of ContextItem instances that make up the content of the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: bookmarks
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: A collection of Bookmark instances within the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: llmServiceVendor
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: The name of the LLM service vendor associated with this context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: init(llmServiceVendor:creationDate:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: Initializes a new Context with a unique identifier and associated LLM service information.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: addItem(content:creationDate:isSummary:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: Adds a new item to the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: addBookmark(for:label:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: Adds a new bookmark to the context for a specific item.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: removeItems(atOffsets:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: Removes items from the context by their index set.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: getRecentItems(limit:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: Retrieves the most recent N items from the context.

Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.name: summarizeItemsInRange(range:summarizer:)
Structs/Context.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7Conte.abstract: Summarizes a range of items within the context and replaces them with a summary item.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.name: contextItemID
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.abstract: The ID of the associated context item.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.name: label
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.abstract: A label describing the bookmark’s purpose or content.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.name: timestamp
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.abstract: The timestamp when the bookmark was created.

Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.name: init(contextItemID:label:)
Structs/Bookmark.html#/s:9AuroraLLM8Book.abstract: Initializes a new bookmark for a given context item with a specified label.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: topP
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Nucleus sampling parameter that limits sampling to the top percentile of tokens. Lower values narrow the scope of the sampling to the most likely tokens.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: frequencyPenalty
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: A penalty applied to reduce the repetition of the same tokens in the response.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: presencePenalty
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: A penalty applied to encourage the introduction of new tokens into the response, promoting variety.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: stopSequences
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Sequences of tokens that signal the LLM to stop generating further tokens when encountered in the response.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: logitBias
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: A map of token biases, allowing customization of the likelihood of specific tokens appearing in the response.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: user
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: An optional user identifier, which can be used for tracking, moderation, or specific user-based adjustments.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: suffix
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: The suffix to add to the generated text (if applicable).

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: preferredDomains
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Preferred domains for the request, used for selecting the most suitable service during routing.

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.name: init(topP:frequencyPenalty:presencePenalty:stopSequences:logitBias:user:suffix:preferredDomains:)
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Initializes a new LLMRequestOptions with default values for all fields.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: messages
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: An array of LLMMessage instances representing either a single prompt or a conversation history.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: temperature
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: The sampling temperature to control randomness (values between 0.0 to 1.0). Higher values (e.g., 1.0) make the output more random, while lower values (e.g., 0.0) make it more deterministic.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: maxTokens
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: The maximum number of tokens in the generated response.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: model
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: The specific LLM model to use for processing (e.g., “gpt-3.5-turbo”, “davinci”). If not specified, the default model for the service will be used.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: stream
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Whether or not to stream the response (default is false).

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: options
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Additional less commonly used configuration options to influence the behavior of the LLM.

Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: init(messages:temperature:maxTokens:model:stream:options:)
Structs/LLMRequest.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Initializes a new LLMRequest with customizable parameters and reasonable defaults for most fields.

Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: role
Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: The role of the message sender, such as “user”, “assistant”, or “system”.

Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: content
Structs/LLMMessage.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: The content of the message, containing the actual text or instructions.

Structs/LLMMessage.html.name: LLMMessage
Structs/LLMMessage.html.abstract: Represents a single message within a conversation for LLM interactions.

Structs/LLMRequest.html.name: LLMRequest
Structs/LLMRequest.html.abstract: A struct representing the input to be sent to the Language Learning Model (LLM).

Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.name: LLMRequestOptions
Structs/LLMRequestOptions.html.abstract: LLMRequestOptions provides a way to configure additional options for LLM requests in a structured manner.

Structs/Bookmark.html.name: Bookmark
Structs/Bookmark.html.abstract: Represents a bookmark within the context, linking to a specific ContextItem by its ID.

Structs/Context.html.name: Context
Structs/Context.html.abstract: Represents the entire context for a conversation or task.

Structs/ContextItem.html.name: ContextItem
Structs/ContextItem.html.abstract: A representation of an individual item within a context. Each ContextItem has text content,

Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html.name: AnthropicLLMResponse
Structs/AnthropicLLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from Anthropic’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.name: AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse
Structs/AnthropicLLMStreamingResponse.ht.abstract: Represents a streaming response from Anthropic’s LLM service.

Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.name: OllamaLLMResponse
Structs/OllamaLLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from Ollama’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.name: OpenAILLMResponse
Structs/OpenAILLMResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response from OpenAI’s LLM models, conforming to LLMResponseProtocol.

Structs/FetchContextsTask.html.name: FetchContextsTask
Structs/FetchContextsTask.html.abstract: FetchContextsTask is responsible for retrieving a list of stored contexts from the disk.

Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.name: SummarizerOptions
Structs/SummarizerOptions.html.abstract: SummarizerOptions provides a way to configure options specifically for summarization tasks.

Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: summarizeGroup(_:type:options:)
Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Summarizes a group of text strings using the LLM service.

Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:9A.name: vendor
Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:9A.abstract: The vendor of the LLM service, if available.

Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:9A.name: model
Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html#/s:9A.abstract: The model used to generate the text, if available.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: vendor
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The name of the LLM service vendor (e.g., “OpenAI”, “Anthropic”, “Ollama”).

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: name
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: apiKey
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The API key or authentication token required to interact with the LLM service.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: requiresAPIKey
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Not all LLM services require an API key for authentication. This property indicates whether the service requires one.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: contextWindowSize
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: maxOutputTokens
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: inputTokenPolicy
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: outputTokenPolicy
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: systemPrompt
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: sendRequest(_:)
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Sends a request to the LLM service asynchronously and returns the response.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html#/s:9Au.abstract: Sends a request to the LLM service asynchronously with support for streaming.

Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.name: name
Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.abstract: The name of the domain router, used for logging and identification purposes.

Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.name: service
Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.abstract: The associated LLM service used to determine the domain.

Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.name: supportedDomains
Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.abstract: A list of domains that the router supports.

Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.name: determineDomain(for:)
Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html#/.abstract: Determines the domain for a given request using the associated LLM service.

Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html.name: LLMDomainRouterProtocol
Protocols/LLMDomainRouterProtocol.html.abstract: Protocol defining the behavior of a domain router in the LLMManager system.

Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html.name: LLMServiceProtocol
Protocols/LLMServiceProtocol.html.abstract: The LLMServiceProtocol defines the interface for interacting with different LLM (Language Learning Model) services.

Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html.name: LLMResponseProtocol
Protocols/LLMResponseProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol that defines a common interface for the response of different LLM services.

Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html.name: SummarizerProtocol
Protocols/SummarizerProtocol.html.abstract: The SummarizerProtocol defines methods for summarizing content via an LLM service.

Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:9Aur.name: adjustToServiceLimits
Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:9Aur.abstract: Automatically adjusts the token limits to match the service’s constraints.

Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:9Aur.name: strictRequestLimits
Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html#/s:9Aur.abstract: Strictly enforces the token limits defined in the request.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: missingAPIKey
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Error thrown when the API key is missing for a service that requires authentication.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: invalidResponse(statusCode:)
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Error thrown when the response from the API is invalid, typically due to an unexpected status code.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: decodingError
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Error thrown when the service encounters an issue decoding the response data.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: invalidURL
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Error thrown when the constructed or provided URL is invalid.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: custom(message:)
Enums/LLMServiceError.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Custom error type for providing more descriptive error messages.

Enums/LLMRole.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7LLMRole.name: rawValue
Enums/LLMRole.html#/s:9AuroraLLM7LLMRole.abstract: Returns the string value of the role, either predefined or custom.

Enums/LLMRole.html.name: LLMRole
Enums/LLMRole.html.abstract: Represents the role of a message sender within a conversation.

Enums/LLMServiceError.html.name: LLMServiceError
Enums/LLMServiceError.html.abstract: LLMServiceError defines a set of error types that can occur while interacting with LLM services.

Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html.name: TokenAdjustmentPolicy
Enums/TokenAdjustmentPolicy.html.abstract: The TokenAdjustmentPolicy enum specifies how input and output token limits are handled for an LLM service.

Enums/SummaryType.html.name: SummaryType
Enums/SummaryType.html.abstract: Enum representing different types of summaries that can be requested.

Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10S.name: init(llmService:)
Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10S.abstract: Initializes a new Summarizer instance with the specified LLM service.

Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10S.name: summarize(_:options:)
Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10S.abstract: Summarizes a text using the LLM service.

Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10S.name: summarizeGroup(_:type:options:)
Classes/Summarizer.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10S.abstract: Summarizes multiple texts using the LLM service.

Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/s:9AuroraL.name: init(name:context:filename:inputs:)
Classes/SaveContextTask.html#/s:9AuroraL.abstract: Initializes a SaveContextTask with the context and filename.

Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/s:9AuroraL.name: init(name:filename:inputs:)
Classes/LoadContextTask.html#/s:9AuroraL.abstract: Initializes a LoadContextTask with the ability to load a context from disk.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: vendor
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: name
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: baseURL
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The base url for the OpenAI API.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: apiKey
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The API key used for authenticating requests to the OpenAI API.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: requiresAPIKey
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: OpenAI requires an API key for authentication.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: contextWindowSize
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 128k.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: maxOutputTokens
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: inputTokenPolicy
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: outputTokenPolicy
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: systemPrompt
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: init(name:baseURL:apiKey:contextWindowSize:maxOutputTokens:inputTokenPolicy:outputTokenPolicy:systemPrompt:urlSession:)
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Initializes a new OpenAIService instance with the given API key.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: sendRequest(_:)
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Sends a request to the OpenAI API asynchronously without streaming.

Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Classes/OpenAIService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Sends a request to the OpenAI API asynchronously with streaming support.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: vendor
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: name
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: baseURL
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The base URL for the Ollama API (e.g., http://localhost:11434).

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: apiKey
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Not required for Ollama but included to satisfy the protocol

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: requiresAPIKey
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Ollama does not require an API key for authentication.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: contextWindowSize
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 4k.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: maxOutputTokens
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: inputTokenPolicy
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: outputTokenPolicy
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: systemPrompt
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: sendRequest(_:)
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Sends a non-streaming request to the Ollama API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Classes/OllamaService.html#/s:9AuroraLLM.abstract: Sends a streaming request to the Ollama API and retrieves partial responses asynchronously.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: vendor
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: The name of the service vendor, required by the protocol.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: name
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: The name of the service instance, which can be customized during initialization

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: apiKey
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: The API key used for authenticating requests to the Anthropic API.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: requiresAPIKey
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: Anthropic requires an API key for authentication.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: contextWindowSize
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: The maximum context window size (total tokens, input + output) supported by the service, defaults to 200k.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: maxOutputTokens
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: The maximum number of tokens allowed for output (completion) in a single request, defaults to 4k.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: inputTokenPolicy
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle input tokens when they exceed the service’s input token limit, defaults to .adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: outputTokenPolicy
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: Specifies the policy to handle output tokens when they exceed the service’s max output token limit, defaults to adjustToServiceLimits.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: systemPrompt
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: The default system prompt for this service, used to set the behavior or persona of the model.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: init(name:baseURL:apiKey:contextWindowSize:maxOutputTokens:inputTokenPolicy:outputTokenPolicy:systemPrompt:urlSession:)
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: Initializes a new AnthropicService instance with the given API key and token limit.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: sendRequest(_:)
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: Sends a non-streaming request to the Anthropic API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:)
Classes/AnthropicService.html#/s:9Aurora.abstract: Sends a request to the Anthropic API and retrieves the response asynchronously.

Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html#/s:9Auro.name: description
Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html#/s:9Auro.abstract: A human-readable description of each routing strategy.

Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html.name: Routing
Classes/LLMManager/Routing.html.abstract: Routing options for selecting an appropriate LLM service.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: registerDomainRouter(_:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Registers a new domain routing service or replaces an existing one.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: registerFallbackService(_:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Registers a new fallback LLM service or replaces an existing one.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: registerService(_:withRoutings:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Registers a new LLM service or replaces an existing one with the same name.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: unregisterService(withName:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Unregisters an LLM service with a specified name.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: setActiveService(byName:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Sets the active LLM service by its registered name.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: routeRequest(_:buffer:trimming:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Routes a request to an appropriate LLM service based on the presence of a domain routing service and registered routings.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: sendRequest(_:routings:buffer:trimming:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Sends a request to an LLM service, applying the specified routing and token trimming strategies if necessary.

Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.name: sendStreamingRequest(_:onPartialResponse:routings:buffer:trimming:)
Classes/LLMManager.html#/s:9AuroraLLM10L.abstract: Sends a streaming request to an LLM service, applying the specified routing and token trimming strategies if necessary.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.name: addNewContext(_:llmService:summarizer:)
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.abstract: Adds a new context to the manager and returns the unique identifier of the new context.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.name: setActiveContext(withID:)
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.abstract: Sets the active context by its ID.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.name: getContextController(for:)
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.abstract: Retrieves a ContextController for a given context ID.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.name: summarizeOlderContexts()
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.abstract: Summarizes older context items across all managed ContextController instances.

Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.name: loadAllContexts()
Classes/ContextManager.html#/s:9AuroraLL.abstract: Loads all contexts from disk and restores them as ContextController instances.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: updateLLMService(_:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Updates the LLM service used by the ContextController.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: addItem(content:creationDate:isSummary:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Adds a new item to the context.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: addBookmark(for:label:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Adds a bookmark to the context for a specific item.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: removeItems(atOffsets:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Removes items from the context based on their offsets.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: updateItem(_:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Updates an existing item in the context.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: summarizeOlderContext(daysThreshold:)
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Summarizes older context items based on a given age threshold.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: fullHistory()
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Retrieves the full history of context items.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: getItems()
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Exposes the context items for testing purposes.

Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.name: getContext()
Classes/ContextController.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Exposes the underlying context for testing or external use.

Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html#/s:9Auror.name: createService(for:)
Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html#/s:9Auror.abstract: Creates and returns an LLM service for the given context based on the service name.

Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/s:9AuroraL.name: init(name:service:supportedDomains:instructions:)
Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/s:9AuroraL.abstract: Initializes the domain router with an LLM service and a list of supported domains.

Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/s:9AuroraL.name: determineDomain(for:)
Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html#/s:9AuroraL.abstract: Determines the domain for a given request using the associated LLM service.

Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html.name: LLMDomainRouter
Classes/LLMDomainRouter.html.abstract: The LLMDomainRouter class is responsible for determining the domain of a request using an LLM service.

Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.name: LLMServiceFactory
Classes/LLMServiceFactory.html.abstract: LLMServiceFactory is responsible for creating instances of LLM services like OpenAI, Anthropic, and Ollama.

Classes/ContextController.html.name: ContextController
Classes/ContextController.html.abstract: ContextController manages the state and operations related to a specific Context, including adding, removing, and updating items, as well as summarizing older items. The controller handles context-specific summarization using a connected LLM service.

Classes/ContextManager.html.name: ContextManager
Classes/ContextManager.html.abstract: ContextManager is responsible for managing multiple ContextController instances.

Classes/LLMManager.html.name: LLMManager
Classes/LLMManager.html.abstract: LLMManager is responsible for managing multiple LLM services and routing requests to the appropriate service based on the specified criteria.

Classes/AnthropicService.html.name: AnthropicService
Classes/AnthropicService.html.abstract: AnthropicService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the Anthropic API.

Classes/OllamaService.html.name: OllamaService
Classes/OllamaService.html.abstract: OllamaService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the Ollama models via its API.

Classes/OpenAIService.html.name: OpenAIService
Classes/OpenAIService.html.abstract: OpenAIService implements the LLMServiceProtocol to interact with the OpenAI API.

Classes/LoadContextTask.html.name: LoadContextTask
Classes/LoadContextTask.html.abstract: LoadContextTask is responsible for loading a Context object from disk.

Classes/SaveContextTask.html.name: SaveContextTask
Classes/SaveContextTask.html.abstract: SaveContextTask is responsible for saving a Context object to disk.

Classes/Summarizer.html.name: Summarizer
Classes/Summarizer.html.abstract: The Summarizer class provides an implementation of the SummarizerProtocol, delegating all summarization tasks to an LLM service.
